医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
系统评价发现使用青春期阻滞剂和激素治疗性别困扰的证据不足关于对经历性别相关困扰的儿童和青少年使用青春期阻滞剂和激素的证据完全不充分，因此无法衡量其有效性或对心理和身体健康的影响，发现对现有研究发表的两篇系统评论，发表于童年疾病档案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240410/Systematic-reviews-find-inadequate-evidence-on-the-use-of-puberty-blockers-and-hormones-for-gender-distress.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240410/Systematic-reviews-find-inadequate-evidence-on-the-use-of-puberty-blockers-and-hormones-for-gender-distress.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e56797c5-79e1-4c74-8989-9baefc63c834 Wed, 10 Apr 2024 15:02:00 -0400 Systematic reviews find inadequate evidence on the use of puberty blockers and hormones for gender distress
外科医生维持终身能力的新循证策略随着数以百万计的美国人临近 66 岁，他们面临着一个不可避免的问题：是时候退休了吗？医生群体与总人口一样正在老龄化——未来十年内，美国超过 40% 的医生将达到 65 岁或以上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240410/New-evidence-based-strategy-for-surgeons-to-sustain-lifelong-competency.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240410/New-evidence-based-strategy-for-surgeons-to-sustain-lifelong-competency.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b19d72a9-cac3-4cb9-bfcf-5ad01744f6c6 Wed, 10 Apr 2024 14:04:00 -0400 New evidence-based strategy for surgeons to sustain lifelong competency
贝勒研究揭示了新遗传的 DNA 变异在隐性疾病中的作用你有你母亲的眼睛和你父亲的微笑，但遗传不仅仅是表面上的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240410/Baylor-study-reveals-role-of-newly-inherited-DNA-variants-in-recessive-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240410/Baylor-study-reveals-role-of-newly-inherited-DNA-variants-in-recessive-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5cb0f939-8993-4193-aa61-c7c114a4cbd6 Wed, 10 Apr 2024 13:27:00 -0400 Baylor study reveals role of newly inherited DNA variants in recessive diseases
三项早期临床研究显示淋巴瘤和胃癌患者有希望的初步数据德克萨斯大学 MD 安德森癌症中心的研究人员在 2024 年美国癌症研究协会 (AACR) 年会上提出的三项早期临床研究显示，淋巴瘤、胃或胃食管交界癌以及特定分子选择患者的初步数据有希望肿瘤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240410/Three-early-phase-clinical-studies-show-promising-initial-data-for-病人-with-lymphoma-gastric-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240410/Three-early-phase-clinical-studies-show-promising-initial-data-for-病人-with-lymphoma-gastric-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=626ed8e6-8669-48cf-a5e8-bd0fe6d67130 Wed, 10 Apr 2024 13:10:46 -0400 Three early-phase clinical studies show promising initial data for patients with lymphoma, gastric cancers
教育视频提高男性前列腺癌筛查意愿作为改善不同社区癌症筛查全面努力的一部分，Penn Medicine 艾布拉姆森癌症中心 (ACC) 社区外展和参与团队开发了一个具有文化敏感性的教育视频，以解决前列腺癌筛查差异问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240410/Educational-video-boosts-prostate-cancer-screening-intentions-in-men.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240410/Educational-video-boosts-prostate-cancer-screening-intentions-in-men.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7698f432-9405-4cf2-8c52-a816a5174949 Wed, 10 Apr 2024 12:57:42 -0400 Educational video boosts prostate cancer screening intentions in men
世界卫生组织报告显示全球病毒性肝炎死亡人数增加根据世界卫生组织（WHO）2024年全球肝炎报告，因病毒性肝炎而死亡的人数正在增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240410/Global-increase-in-deaths-from-viral-hepatitis-revealed-in-WHO-report.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240410/Global-increase-in-deaths-from-viral-hepatitis-revealed-in-WHO-report.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9dd87bb4-1373-4737-96cd-0cc13a8eecc7 Wed, 10 Apr 2024 12:53:03 -0400 Global increase in deaths from viral hepatitis revealed in WHO report
全球范围内最大规模的霍乱快速诊断检测部署，以更好地控制疾病今天，霍乱快速诊断检测 (RDT) 试剂盒抵达马拉维，标志着一项全球计划的启动，该计划将在未来几个月内向 14 个霍乱高风险国家分发超过 120 万份检测试剂盒。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240410/Largest-ever-global-deployment-of-cholera-rapid-diagnostic-tests-for-better-disease-control.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240410/Largest-ever-global-deployment-of-cholera-rapid-diagnostic-tests-for-better-disease-control.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=702442db-136b-4dc8-aaea-1ed301140e25 Wed, 10 Apr 2024 12:32:42 -0400 Largest-ever global deployment of cholera rapid diagnostic tests for better disease control
解读癌症可塑性：MSK 斯隆研究的见解大约 90% 的癌症死亡是由于转移造成的 -;也就是说，癌症从最初的原发肿瘤扩散到全身（通常在肺、肝和脑）播散新肿瘤的能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240410/Deciphering-cancer-plastyInsights-from-MSK-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240410/Deciphering-cancer-plastyInsights-from-MSK-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=480c663a-60e2-4dfc-8716-d0971ee957a3 Wed, 10 Apr 2024 12:28:45 -0400 Deciphering cancer plasticity:Insights from MSK research
使用 SCENT 方法进行增强子基因图谱分析可深入了解疾病机制疾病的遗传学研究绘制了驱动疾病的基因组片段。但要了解这些变化如何导致疾病进展，重要的是要了解它们如何改变被认为驱动疾病的细胞群中疾病基因的基因调控。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240410/Enhancer-gene-mapping-with-SCENT-method-offers-insights-into-disease-mechanisms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240410/Enhancer-gene-mapping-with-SCENT-method-offers-insights-into-disease-mechanisms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e1c1555c-f3d5-4b3a-b434-7ee89e5b52a1 Wed, 10 Apr 2024 12:23:08 -0400 Enhancer-gene mapping with SCENT method offers insights into disease mechanisms
国会可能会否决新冠时代的远程医疗政策国会山关于农村健康问题的听证会已经进行了近两个小时，众议员布拉德·温斯特鲁普（Brad Wenstrup）强调告诉委员会的五名证人：“和我们一起坚持下去。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240410/Congress-likely-to-kick-the-can-on-covid-era-telehealth-policies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240410/Congress-likely-to-kick-the-can-on-covid-era-telehealth-policies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e1634c58-4045-4c5e-9868-18ced44b209e Wed, 10 Apr 2024 07:16:36 -0400 Congress likely to kick the can on covid-era telehealth policies
